# Dijkstra
Quick toy to play with Dijkstra Maps for Roguelikes


## Sample Output
#### Run 1
```
1123456789
1012345678
2112345678
3222345678
3333345678
2333334567
1232223456
0122112345
1122101234
2223211234
```
#### Run 2
```
444456789a
3333456789
3222345678
3211234567
3210123456
3321123456
3222223456
3211233456
3210123456
4321123456
```
#### Run 3
```
4444543211
3333443210
3222344321
3211234432
3210123443
4321123454
5432112345
5432101234
6543211234
7654322234
```
